title: Market Day
description: Sex Harem Science Fiction – Market Day Sex Slave Erotica for Men A vault-survivor awakens to a savage world, where beautiful girls are kept naked and chained, and sold as sex slaves. He visits a market to buy slave girls for his harem. Not all he buys are ready to kneel at his feet, and not all he desires, are for sale. Will he get the women he desires, and will they kiss his feet and call him Master? A literotica tale of BDSM sexual slavery, submission, and dominance, in a cruel, Iron-Age world. This story contains highly sexually and explicit content and is intended for a mature audience, only. All characters are 18+. Themes covered - girl on girl - M/f/f - Women sex slaves - A harem of women - degrading sex - oral sex, male dominance - Threesome sex - Sexual submission - Conditioning, training, and punishing slaves - Slave girls examined, valued, and sold - Sexual slavery - mens erotica / men’s erotica / erotica for men This book is priced at 99 cents, as a special introduction rate to the series - and my writing!
author: Alice Sinclair
